name: @cuongpo/neo-defi-mcp
description: Swap tokens on the NEO blockchain with slippage and deadline controls. View balances and account details for your wallet. Use your own wallet and RPC endpoint for secure, direct execution.

tools.name: swap
tools.title: Swap Tokens on NEO
tools.description: Execute a token swap on the NEO blockchain using the specified DEX contract

tokenIn.description: Hash160 address of the input token (e.g., 0xd2a4cff31913016155e38e474a2c06d08be276cf)

amountIn.description: Amount of input tokens to swap (e.g., 0.1 for 0.1 tokens)

desiredToken.description: Hash160 address of the desired output token (e.g., 0x8a651ecad98582603323bdd20169b81b81c1da5c)

tools.name: addLiquidity
tools.title: Add Liquidity to NEO DEX
tools.description: Add liquidity to a token pair on the NEO blockchain DEX

tokenA.description: Hash160 address of the first token (e.g., 0x48c40d4666f93408be1bef038b6722404d9a4c2a)

tokenB.description: Hash160 address of the second token (e.g., 0xc0283310a5117b9d007941e8a0dc3dae9593f65c)

amountA.description: Amount of first token to add

amountB.description: Amount of second token to add

lockUntil.description: Lock liquidity until timestamp (default: 0 for no lock)

tools.name: stake
tools.title: Stake LP Token
tools.description: Stake liquidity pool token (bNEO-TTM-1940) to the staking contract

amount.description: Amount to stake (e.g., 0.01 will stake 1 unit)

tools.name: getPair
tools.title: Get Pair Details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a token pair from the DEX

tokenA.description: Hash160 address of the first token (e.g., 0x48c40d4666f93408be1bef038b6722404d9a4c2a)

tokenB.description: Hash160 address of the second token (e.g., 0xf853a98ac55a756ae42379a312d55ddfdf7c8514)

tools.name: getTokens
tools.title: Get All Available Tokens
tools.description: Get a list of all available tokens on the DEX

tools.name: getAllTokenPrices
tools.title: Get All Token Prices
tools.description: Get current prices for all tokens on the DEX

tools.name: getTokenPrice
tools.title: Get Token Price
tools.description: Get the current price for a specific token

tools.name: getTokenPriceHistory
tools.title: Get Token Price History
tools.description: Get historical price data for a specific token

days.description: Number of days of history to retrieve (default: 7)

tools.name: getAllPairs
tools.title: Get All Available Pairs
tools.description: Get a list of all available trading pairs on the DEX

tools.name: get-account-info
tools.title: Get Account Information
tools.description: Get information about the configured NEO account
